abstract: Despite a turbulent year for the nation’s banks, Heidi Miller of JPMorgan Chase has retained her position at the top of U.S. Banker’s and American Banker’s annual list of the 25 most powerful women in banking.
snippet: Despite a turbulent year for the nation’s banks, Heidi Miller of JPMorgan Chase has retained her position at the top of U.S. Banker’s and American Banker’s annual list of the 25 most powerful women in banking.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street may have been utterly rearranged by the financial crisis, but at least one thing has remained constant: Heidi Miller of JPMorgan Chase has kept her position at the top of U.S. Banker’s and American Banker’s list of the 25 most powerful women in banking.

headline.main: A Powerful Woman Banker Retains Her Ranking
